title: Man travels 5000 miles to play his piano for Ukrainian refugees
description: CNN's Sara Sidner speaks with Davide Martello, a German man who traveled to the Ukrainian-Polish border with his piano to bring peace and hope to Ukrainian refugees through his music.

title: Jake Tapper says US foreign policy partly to blame for Russia crisis
description: CNN's Jake Tapper says two decades of stern warnings and misplaced optimism in US foreign policy helped pave the way for Russian President Vladimir Putin to invade Ukraine.

title: 'SNL': See famous actor as a 10-year-old
description: First time "Saturday Night Live" host Oscar Isaac shared clips from his first movie, which he made when he was ten.

title: Civilian evacuation delayed as Ukraine accuses Russia of breaching agreement to pause fire
description: Ukrainian authorities halted evacuations from the besieged city of Mariupol on Saturday, accusing Russian forces of breaching an agreement to pause fire and give civilians safe passage out.
